name: Probot Soccer
description: Probot Soccer is a third person soccer-style sports game where the player controls a robot. The aim of the game is to kick the soccer ball into the AI robot opponent's goal. The game includes various levels of difficulty which increase the number of rounds you must play against the AI robot opponent to win the game. The game has two maps: a daytime and a nighttime soccer field. You can keep track of how many wins and losses you have through the in-game scoreboard that can be reset if desired.
